Package de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.exception

Exception Summary
DataBridgeException Base exception of the IDataBridge.
DataBridgeRuntimeException Special DataBridgeException to handle exception during the execution of the tmql4j data-bridge function.
TMQLConverterException Exception class thrown by a IQuery implementation if the given query cannot be convert to a TMQL query.
TMQLException Base exception of the TMQL engine.
TMQLExtensionRegistryException Special exception class thrown if any extensions represented by the IExtensionPoint interface can not be registered correctly.
TMQLGeneratorException Exception is thrown during the parsing process if the generation of the parser tree fails.
TMQLInitializationException Special runtime exception thrown if the initialization process fails.
TMQLInvalidSyntaxException The exception is thrown if the given query is invalid.
TMQLLexerException Exception thrown the lexical scanning fails.
TMQLOptimizationException Base exception representing an exception thrown during the optimization process of the TMQL engine.
TMQLParserException Exception thrown by the parser because of invalid syntax or because of some problems during the generation of the parser tree.
TMQLRuntimeException Base runtime exception thrown if any process task or any operation fails during the execution of the TMQL engine.
TMQLUnknownQueryTypeException Exception thrown by QueryFactory if the type of the given query is unknown or can not be determined.
UnsupportedModuleException Special definition of a DataBridgeException representing the case that a method is not supported by the real implementation.
